item.title: NIELSON DIPLOMATA 380 VOLVO 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
NIELSON DIPLOMATA 380 VOLVO 1.50 ETS2

Original engine sound 2 pieces OM457LA
Added wiper and warning assistant (side protection).
Digital Tacho added.
3 normal color options added. (Metallic – Normal – Matte)
Cockpit coverings have been converted to adjustable options.
Steering wheel covers have been converted to adjustable options.
Leather support was added to the seats.
Seat covers have been converted to adjustable options.
Rear view camera added.
Engine sound and retader added as sound.
Front fog lights are housed in two colors. (Yellow and White Zeno)
The headlights were updated and the lens model was installed.
Rear lights have been changed.
A sliding LED sign was added to the rear window. (You can also make your
own, there are 2 templates, long or short text)
The overall FPS rate of the mode has been improved.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Pete 389 MEGAPACK by Pizz v4.1.2 ATS
item.description:
Pete 389 MEGAPACK by Pizz v4.1.2 ATS

There are plenty of options to keep you occupied and much more to come. Some of the features are:
– Daycab, 36/48/63″ flattop sleepers, 48/63″ standup sleepers, a custom chopped 72″ sleeper. Some of the sleepers have diamond windows in the rear.
– For chassis right now there is 220, 250, 305″ and a 305″ with pusher axle.
– Plenty of front/rear bumpers, headlights, mirrors, exhaust, airlines for you to explore.
– Intensive customisation options for accessories and parts
Works on ATS version 1.50



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: IMPROVED TRAIN SOUNDS 1.50 ATS
item.description:
IMPROVED TRAIN SOUNDS 1.50 ATS

Eliminate potential conflicts with map mods and traffic mods);
– Headlights on trains now have a realistic range and high beam mask at night.

This mod replaces the standard trains sounds in ATS with an improved version that adds an engine, horn*, bell sound*, and rolling stock/rail noise**.

Currently only the mover type trains have these sounds.
Currenly only the mover type trains have this sound, it is currently not possible to apply sounds to trailing rollstock, once it is possible, they will be added accordingly



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Project Lofoten v1.0.1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Project Lofoten v1.0.1.50 ETS2

Changes 1.0.1.50
– Fixed some bugs and more
– No new cities

This is a map from Euromaps! Started on this project September 2023, and been busy so we’re just releasing a small version now!

Cities:
V1:
Andenes
Harstad
Sortland

V2 (will come later):
Lødingen
Henningsvær
Svolvær
Å i Lofoten
Røst?

Delivery places:
Harstad:
Biltema
Norrfood
Renar
NS Oil

Sortland:
Biltema
Norrfood
Norrsken
Renar
NS Oil

Andenes:
Container-Port
Norrfood
Norrsken
Renar
NS Oil

To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
